visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with the series name 'Temperature'. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors and other configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The x-axis represents the months of the year, while the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series, named 'Temperature', contains the monthly average temperature data. The chart also includes custom colors for the series and additional configurations such as chart margins, background color, and legend settings. The legend is positioned on the right side of the chart, with vertical alignment at the top.
